markdownRemark.html:
I was following an academic career in physics working at the interface between experimental plasma physics and source development with ultra-short and ultra-intense lasers.

After obtaining the PhD degree I decided to change my career path and continue with something I enjoyed since the first time I typed qbasic in a DOS terminal in the last millennium: programming.

This page is about personal projects, lessons learned, and anything that comes to my mind and is worth publishing.
